name: 徐正會
objective: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.
schedule:
1. Kinematics Fundamentals
2. Dimensional Synthesis 
3. Quick-return Mechanisms
4. Straight-line Mechanisms
5. Graphical Linkage Synthesis I
6. Graphical Linkage Synthesis II
7. Planar Dyads
8. Synthesis of Linkages by Using Dyads
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Three-position Analytical Synthesis
11. Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators
12. Instantaneous Kinematics
13. Four-position Analytical Synthesis
14. Five-position Analytical Synthesis
15. Dynamics Fundamentals I
16. Dynamics Fundamentals II
17. Balancing of Mechanisms
18. Final Exam.
materials:
“Kinematics and Dynamics of Machinery” by Norton (東華，新月); 
“Kinematics, Dynamics, and Design of Machinery” by Waldron (歐亞)
